text: Christopher Allen Darden (born April 7, 1956) is an American lawyer, author, and educator. He worked for 15 years in the Los Angeles County District Attorney's office. He was a co-prosecutor in the O. J. Simpson murder trial, a role in which he gained a great deal of national attention. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Los Angeles Category:Educators from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Christopher Darden
